'''David Brierly''' ([[1935]] – [[10 June|June 10]], [[2008]]) was a British actor. He was best known as robotic dog [[wikipedia:K-9 (Doctor Who)|K-9]] in various incarnations of ''Doctor Who''.

==Roles==
* [[1968]]: [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]]: [[Kíli]], Elf guard
